Rosebell Kagumire gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Bwerayangi maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ Mass Communication na Mahadum Makerere wee gụchaa na 2005
O nwetara asambodo na Global Leadership and Public Policy for 21st Century na Harvard Kennedy School na asambodo na Nonviolent Conflict na Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, Tufts University
Rosebell jigidere Masters na Media, Peace and Conflict ọmụmụ sitere na Mahadum Udo nke United Nations nyere ikike na Costa Rica.
